original_text: With that, one of Jesus’ companions reached for his sword, drew it out and struck the servant of the high priest, cutting off his ear.
korean_text: 예수와 함께 있던 자 중의 하나가 손을 펴 칼을 빼어 대제사장의 종을 쳐 그 귀를 떨어뜨리니

sentences.original_text: With that, one of Jesus' companions reached for his sword
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 예수님의 동료 중 한 사람이 칼을 잡았고

sentences.original_text: and struck the servant of the high priest
